text: B.J. Marsh (February 21, 1940 â€“ December 24, 2020) was an American politician and businessman. He was a member of the Missouri House of Representatives from 2000 to 2008 and 1988 to 1992. He was a member of the Republican Party. Marsh was born in Dade County, Missouri. Marsh died on December 24, 2020 in Springfield, Missouri from problems caused by COVID-19. He was 80 years old. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Members of the Missouri General Assembly Category:Politicians from Missouri Category:Businesspeople from Missouri Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the United States
title: B. J. Marsh
